message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $11,500. I think it will be very valuable for you and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of a price more around $10,500. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand your position, Bob, but $10,500 is a bit too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking of a price more around $10,750. Would you be willing to consider that?
Bob, I'm trying to be fair with my pricing. How about we split the difference again and settle at $10,875?
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. Would you be willing to go down to $10,700?
